title: Cryptowebworld.com
author: Cryptowebworld.com
content: The CWW forum sells ad space to different locations in the forum. Please visit the Advertisement Guidelines before placing a bid to avoid problems. The majority of the profit goes toward hosting expenses and compensating moderators for their efforts. Any extra money is often either set aside for future costs or invested in the forum or ecosystem in some other way.https://cryptowebworld.com/threads/round-1-advertisement-auction-november-2022.1895/Available slots- Global Header - Can be seen throughout the forum (AD1)- Below the first message of the thread (Each page)(AD2)Bidding DurationBidding will start at the first day of the month and will end at 25 (eg. Starting bid: January 1, End Bid: January 25) This is to give time for the project to create and submit the design to us.You must pay within 24 hours of the auction ending. USDT and BTC are accepted. If you fail to pay in time the slot will be given to the second highest bid.Advertisement DurationThe advertisement will run from the start of the month until the end of the month.Failure to follow the guidelines will result in rejection.Auction Rules• Read the Advertisement Guidelines first before placing a bid.• Include the name of the project on your Bid or you can send it to me in PM.• If you place a new bid (Of course it should be higher). Your previous bid will automatically be canceled.• You can put multiple bids at one post.• If you would like multiple slots for one postion you should include it in the post.• Editing of posts is not allowed.• If two people bid at the same price, we will consider the first person who bid first.• We have the right to reject any bids even days after the bid was made.Starting Bid and IncrementsGlobal Header - Can be seen throughout the forum [CODE: AD1]Starting Bid: $100.00Minimum Bid Increment: $50Below the first message of the thread (Each page) [CODE: AD2]Starting Bid: $100.00Minimum Bid Increment: $50BIDDING FORMAT AND EXAMPLE:Format: "Code" "Slot" @ "Price"Example1: AD1 - 2 @100 - Meaning bidding for 2 slots in global header for $100 on each slot (total $200 for 2 slots).Example2: AD2 - 4 @150 - Meaning bidding for 4 slots in global header for $150 on each slot (total $600 for 4 slots).The ad banners are dynamic, so if somebody gets 5 slots for AD1, then this will mean that the advertisement banner will be displayed approx 84% of the times.If somebody gets 1 slot for AD2, then this will mean that the advertisement banner will be displayed approx 17% of the times.The maximum number of slots that will be auctioned is 10 (5 for AD1 and 5 for AD2).PaymentYou must pay for your slots within 24 hours after receiving the payment address. If you fail to pay within 24 hours, we are going to give the slot to the second highest bidder. I will send the payment information via PM after announcing the result of the auction here in this thread.
